name: Travel Planning Assistant
description: Helps users plan travel itineraries, suggests attractions, and recommends packing lists based on location and weather.

subAgents.name: Itinerary Planner
subAgents.role: Creates personalized day-wise travel schedules based on trip duration and preferences
capabilities: Adjust schedules based on weather forecasts

subAgents.name: Tourist Attraction Finder
subAgents.role: Suggests popular and hidden gem attractions based on location
capabilities: Suggest local experiences and hidden gems
Provide information about opening hours and entry fees
Recommend best times to visit attractions

subAgents.name: Packing Guide
subAgents.role: Recommends travel essentials based on destination and weather
